Author: trenditstudios
Title: [ANN][ICO] Trendit - Instagram/Facebook with Cryptocurrency Rewards!
Body: Library credits is a content sharing platform backed by it's own blockchain. People pay library credits to view content. On our platform everyone can view all content for free. Users are paid in Trend Tokens or Ethereum. Library credits are inflationary, Trend tokens are deflationary allowing greater growth in value. Library is not looking to sell data and involve big enterprises, trendit will use trend analytics and give opportunities for promoting and advertising content. Involving businesses by offering Trend analytics will give much greater Value to Trend Tokens as businesses will have incentives to use tokens when paying for the platform services.

They usually would be a derivative of the real address with small changes like a misspell.

Author: trenditstudios
Title: [ANN][ICO] Trendit - Instagram/Facebook with Cryptocurrency Rewards!
Body: Hi Charlie,  Yes steemit is a very good platform. However it is tailored towards good writers. The best writers earn more rewards. Trendit will aim to be a platform for everyone! Took an amazing photo of the moon? Share it, watch it go viral and earn rewards. Or maybe just share a photo of what you ate for lunch and get a chance to eat that lunch for free!    Please see our website for more information. Feel free to ask questions!  You can also join our telegram general chat to get in touch with the rest of the community.

Author: trenditstudios
Title: [ANN][ICO] Trendit - Instagram/Facebook with Cryptocurrency Rewards!
Body: Trendit - A Rewarding Social Media Platform for Viral Content!  https://i.imgur.com/XLZgWlH.png   Website | Whitepaper | Twitter | Medium | Telegram | Facebook | Reddit | Simple Bounty Program     Bounty0x Bounty Program  Trendit Token Sale | Timing February 8th, 2018 to March 15th, 2018 Air Drop and Bounty rewards will be issued within 10 days after close of the token sale.  Become an early adopter/member and earn TND [/color] Look at the bottom of the post to learn how to earn more TND    *** WHAT IS TRENDIT?  ***  Trendit is a social media platform that pays users with Cryptocurrency rewards for sharing content!  https://trenditstudios.com/images/mockup/challengeCard.PNG   *** WHY JOIN TRENDIT?  ***  Every user can share content and get weekly PAYMENTS in Cryptocurrency!      *** WHAT CAN YOU SHARE ON TRENDIT?  ***  On Trendit you can share any of the following:  TRENDS  you are passionate about    https://i.imgur.com/6L8sEC1.jpg              CHALLENGES  that are viral    https://i.imgur.com/sLXRzqu.jpg           EVENTS  you want to take part in    https://i.imgur.com/ZeZFbxI.jpg        Any discussion about these topics are encouraged. Please join us in the discussion below!   *** HOW DOES TRENDIT PAY YOU?  ***  Trendit pays you in Trend Tokens for every Pledge that you get! (See the explainer video)    https://i.imgur.com/cRwU2Tl.png      *Users can pledge to content indicating they support it or will try out the challenge themselves.   *** WHAT ARE TREND TOKENS?  ***  Trend Tokens are the currency used by Trendit and it's ecosystem. It is an ERC20 based Ethereum Token         *** HOW ARE TREND TOKENS DISTRIBUTED?  ***   The Total Supply of Trend Tokens are 200,000,000 TND   Trend Tokens are distributed as follows: (Watch the Video)  120,000,000 TND:Initial Coin Offering 40,000,000 TND:User Acquisition 40,000,000 TND:Bounty, Airdrops, Employee Incentives, Advisors and Founding Team, Future Reserve   https://i.imgur.com/6VTkOdz.png     *** HOW CAN YOU EARN TREND TOKENS NOW?  ***  What do you want to see on Trendit? Have any recommendations? We want to hear from YOU!   Trendit will do an airdrop based on the top contributors to the discussion. Criticisms, questions, concerns, and suggestions are all encouraged.    We want to engage with our future user base! (Register now!)    Every week, our top contributors will earn a total of 1000 TND. You can see your allocated TND on the website      We will contact our top contributors at the end of our ICO for distribution of bounty and airdrop Trend Tokens!    Thank You - TRENDIT TEAM          If you want to earn even more FREE Trend Tokens, check out our Bounty0x bounty (Simple Bounty Program)
